short_description: eurotext aktiengesellschaft is a translation services company based in würzburg, germany.
long_description: projekte verwalten, mit kunden kommunizieren und übersetzer beauftragen. wir sind experten für mehrsprachigkeit und übersetzungen. unser erfahrenes team aus den bereichen übersetzung, projektmanagement, it und dtp setzt täglich problemlos große und komplexe übersetzungsprojekte schnell und lösungsorientiert um. parallel dazu richtet unser vendor management seinen fokus auf eine kollegiale und vertrauensvolle zusammenarbeit mit unseren freiberuflichen mitarbeitern.
generated_description: eurotext ag is a translation company based in würzburg, bavaria. the company specializes in professional translation services, offering the translation of specialized texts into various languages. eurotext provides practical experience and further training for university students, graduates, and career changers. the company also manages translation projects, communicates with clients, and assigns translators. eurotext's team includes experts in translation, project management, it, and dtp, ensuring quick and solution-oriented management for large and complex translation projects. the company serves a diverse range of industries, including automotive, fashion, healthcare, consumer goods, marketing, media, law, software, technology, environment, and finance. eurotext maintains a friendly and open relationship with its global client base and collaborates collegially with its freelance employees.
generated_business_tags: quick and solution-oriented management | project management services | multilingualism | it and dtp services | modern translation support tools | linguistic error prevention tips
